2014-11-12.caption: People everywhere are doing extraordinary things—and we want to introduce them to you. Follow our journey as we go around the world and meet people who #DoMore every day.

Coffee is in Laila Ghambari’s blood; she practically grew up in Cherry Street Coffee House, founded by her father. She teaches barista skills to people across the world, both in person and online from her #Seattle home. @lay_luh also works with the Barista Guild of America and helps grow the #coffee community in Iran, where her father was born. #DoMore

2014-11-13.caption: In addition to being Cherry Street’s Director of Coffee, #Seattle native Laila Ghambari (@lay_luh) is also the 2014 US Barista Champion. Each component of her winning signature drink—espresso, #coffee cherry syrup, and smoke from coffee tree wood—was grown on the same farm in El Salvador. #DoMoreNext up: a surgeon who 3D prints body parts.

2014-11-14.caption: Dr. Ben Starnes is revolutionizing vascular surgery through the use of #3Dprinting. By creating an exact replica of a patient’s aorta, he’s transformed an expensive, invasive open-cavity operation into a non-invasive procedure that’s more affordable, more accurate, and can be completed within minutes. #DoMore

2014-11-15.caption: Dr. Ben Starnes is the chief of the Vascular Surgery Division at @UofWa. He’s more than a lifesaver; he’s a game-changer. His #3Dprinting technique enables him to create a stent using a perfect replica of a patient’s aorta, making surgery an option for more people. #DoMore

2014-11-17.caption: We’re going around the world to find people who #DoMore every day—and photographer @justinbastien will be there to capture it all. A #California-based adventure enthusiast, Justin will be trekking across four continents to bring you inspiring stories.

2014-11-18.caption: When @justinbastien isn’t on location photographing incredible adventures, he’s busy living them. You can find him deep water soloing in New Zealand, catching waves off the coast of Chile, or camping out of his van in Joshua Tree. For Justin, #photography is a platform for seeing the world, meeting new people, and—above all—having fun. #DoMore

2014-11-19.caption: When she’s not working on the next evolution of #Microsoft mobile devices, @DonaSarkar applies the visualization skills she’s honed as an engineer to the fashion world. She started out designing garments for friends and family, but has also created pieces for @LulyYangCouture. #DoMore

2014-11-20.caption: If she’s not working as a Microsoft engineering manager or pursuing her love of fashion design, @DonaSarkar is probably writing. She’s a published author and is currently working on a collection of stories and advice for the next generation of #womenintech. #DoMore

2014-11-21.caption: #BehindTheScenes: Our photographer @JustinBastien is head over heels for #Portland, the next stop on our #DoMore world tour. #WPPhoto #ShotOnMyLumia

2016-06-23.caption: Lights, camera, action! #OZO gets ready for a photo shoot at #CannesLions.

2016-06-24.caption: "The perfect brand experience doesn't feel like a brand experience." Hans Lee, Sticky. #CannesLions #VirtuallyHere #OZO
It’s Midsummer in Finland – time to slow down and enjoy the sauna, bonfires and the night when the sun never sets.

2016-06-26.caption: "The perfect brand experience in #VR is the one that feels right for the brand." Amanda Malko, Tongal. #CannesLions #VirtuallyHere #OZO

2016-05-01.caption: How do you celebrate May Day, or "Vappu," like a Finn? By putting on your graduation hat and getting together with friends for a picnic in the park. Hauskaa Vappua!

2016-05-02.caption: A fan described IoT as a world where everything is connected. A grand vision for the future! #ourfansrock

2016-05-03.caption: How to spark employee innovation? Through Nokia Garage, an innovative workspace aiming to shrink the distance between ideas and working prototypes.

2016-05-08.caption: Happy #MothersDay! The perfect day for sharing a hug and spending time together.

2016-05-17.caption: #TelecommunicationDay celebrates the importance of communication and how information travels around the world. Let's connect!
We had the chance to introduce the First Lady of Japan, Akie Abe, to a VR experience at Slush Asia!

2016-05-23.caption: We had a great time attending Slush Asia in Tokyo this month, introducing attendees to our #OZO camera and immersing them in virtual reality. Have you experienced VR yet?

2016-05-26.caption: #OZO captures Nokia Technologies president Ramzi Haidamus in 3D VR on the red carpet at the Alice Through the Looking Glass premiere at the El Capitan Theatre in Hollywood. #ThroughTheLookingGlass

2016-06-02.caption: Our fans saw increased awareness of their personal health as one of the main benefits from wearables. We agree! #ourfansrock

2016-06-06.caption: Our chairman Risto Siilasmaa during his keynote speech at ICT Summit in Tokyo, Japan: “The laws of business are changing rapidly.”

2016-06-14.caption: “With improved performance month after month, I am proud of Nokia’s leadership,” our CEO Rajeev Suri says at #NokiaIAR.

2016-06-18.caption: “Today, we are back in the consumer space and we’re proud to have Withings with us.” - President of Nokia Technologies, Ramzi Haidamus, addressing the crowd at our new San Francisco office opening.

2016-03-23.caption: Finns don’t settle for just any kind of #Easter egg - it’s tradition to enjoy chocolate and nougat treats inside actual egg shells.

2016-03-24.caption: Our CEO Rajeev Suri kicking off a collaboration to continue making #Dubai the safest and smartest city in the world. #5G #SmartCity

2016-03-30.caption: We opened our doors and invited university students to our Solution Experience Centre in Espoo, #Finland to help broaden their understanding of digitalisation and it’s effect on society.

2016-04-05.caption: Choosing where to socialize online is like choosing where to meet your friends offline. One of our #fans would ideally want to hang out with all of them in one place. Well, online we all can. #ourfansrock

2016-04-06.caption: Want to have your say on the stories we share? We’d love to hear your feedback, so please fill in our survey to get involved. You’ll find the link in our bio.

2016-04-07.caption: Here's our Chairman Risto Siilasmaa enjoying the honor of meeting with the HRH Emir of Kuwait to discuss how technology can help humanity.

2016-04-12.caption: Planning a trip to #Finland? Here are some tips on how to speak like a local.

2016-04-13.caption: Innovation happens when risks are taken. “We should think more open-mindedly and long-term about possible futures," chairman Risto Siilasmaa says in an interview with Finnish magazine Image.

2016-04-14.caption: Imagine learning to code by making breakfast! Our colleagues in Athens creatively shared their expertise with local students through interactive games and magic tricks. Why? Because we believe in equipping and inspiring future tech influencers.

2016-04-19.caption: We’re having a great time at @NABshow presenting the Nokia #OZO which makes creating virtual reality experiences easier. That means there’ll be more immersive entertainment to enjoy!

2016-04-26.caption: Capturing a 360-degree view from above with the Nokia #OZO. The sky's the limit!

2016-04-28.caption: Our team enjoying the chance to introduce #GirlsinICT job perspectives with German Chancellor Angela Merkel in #Berlin.

2016-02-22.caption: Barry French our Marketing EVP spotted recording a welcome message from our stand. #MWC16
We’re at #MWC16, and very excited to see the buzz around our stand. If you’re here, come and say hi!

2016-02-23.caption: With industry movers and makers from around the world flocking to Mobile World Congress 2016, all eyes are on Barcelona. We had a great first day and can’t wait for more! #MWC16
Today Barcelona met #OZO. We filmed some great reactions and look forward to sharing them soon! #MWC16

2016-02-24.caption: The #OZO is ready to greet more #MWC16 attendees. Let's kick off day 3!

2016-02-25.caption: Big thanks from our #MWC16 team to everyone who visited our stand to experience what we're up to!

2016-02-29.caption: Last week in #Barcelona we took #VirtualReality to the streets and let people experience demos shot with the #OZO. Looks like this tester enjoyed what he saw!

2016-03-01.caption: Our team was thrilled to receive iF World Design Guide’s Gold Award for Product Design for their work on the Nokia #OZO. #goteam

2016-03-07.caption: We took to the streets of Barcelona to share how virtual reality feels like. We captured some fun reactions to experiences shot with the #OZO and can’t wait to share more of them with you! #VirtualReality #comingsoon

2016-03-14.caption: Our CEO Rajeev Suri has made his debut as Broadband Commissioner in UN’s initiative to use technology for sustainability and economic growth. Here he shares a laugh with Houlin Zhao, Secretary-General of ITU, the organisation leading the initiative. Picture credit: ITU

2016-03-18.caption: Congrats to our team for their award-winning Connected Car Project! Their work is all about improving road safety and preventing traffic jams. So long, rush hour stress.

2016-03-20.caption: We’re wishing everyone well on this #InternationalDayOfHappiness! Celebrate by sharing a #laugh with a friend and doing something you #enjoy.

2015-12-31.caption: Happy New Year! We hope 2016 is filled with adventure, happiness and lots of laughter. #happynewyear #2016

2016-01-05.caption: During the next couple of days, we’ll be sharing some of our favorite fan comments from the past year. Thanks for all the feedback – you certainly mean a lot to us! #ourfansrock

2016-01-08.caption: After celebrating our 150th birthday in 2015, we’re looking ahead and hope you’re joining us for the ride. #Nokia150years #ourfansrock

2016-01-18.caption: Last Thursday was a day of celebrations in our offices around the world as we welcomed our new colleagues from Alcatel-Lucent. Even the freezing cold couldn’t stop us - here’s a pic from the open air festivities at our HQ in Espoo, Finland. #newconnectivity

2016-02-07.caption: Happy Chinese New Year! As the year of the Monkey begins, we’re wishing everyone health and happiness. #ChineseNewYear2016

2017-03-30.caption: OPPO designed a customised 120° wide-angle Front Camera, able to capture a twice larger broader view than the standard 80° cameras. #OPPOF3Plus #SelfieExpert #DualSelfieCamera

2017-04-05.caption: #OPPOF3Plus sports a 4,000 mAh battery backed with OPPO’s industry-leading VOOC Flash Charge. The new #SelfieExpert uses cutting-edge power-saving optimizations, intelligently managing a your favorite applications to make sure they’re ready when you are.

2017-04-06.caption: #OPPOF3Plus’ camera uses Dual PDAF (phase detection autofocus) technology, a next-generation upgrade to standard PDAF solutions. Dual PDAF doubles the area of the sensor’s pixel array that’s equipped with the special photodiodes necessary for phase-detection autofocus, making for 40% faster focus speeds even in low light and producing crystal-clear images. #SelfieExpert #DualSelfieCamera

2017-04-07.caption: #OPPOF3Plus uses an advanced solid-state fingerprint reader, so that only a slight touch is enough to unlock the device. Equipped with a hyrdrophobic membrane that uses the same principle as a naturally water-resistant lotus leaf, the fingerprint reader has an enhanced success rate even when a user’s fingers are moist.

2017-04-10.caption: Beautify 4.0 allows users to capture their very best looks. Blemish reduction has been refined to ensure beautiful, natural-looking shots that are eye-catching for all the right reasons. #OPPOF3Plus #SelfieExpert #DualSelfieCamera

At the center of #OPPOF3Plus’ rear camera prowess is the all-new Sony IMX398 sensor, a customized 1/2.8 inch sensor that Sony developed exclusively for OPPO. With this sensor and an extra-wide F1.7 aperture, the F3 Plus’ rear camera offers phenomenal focusing speed, noise reduction and low-light performance, allowing users to snap breathtakingly clear and beautiful images at a moment’s notice. #SelfieExpert #DualSelfieCamera

2017-04-12.caption: #OPPOF3Plus #DualSelfieCamera lets you take 120° wide angle photoe so everyone can fit in! Easily! #SelfieExpert

2017-04-13.caption: Inspired by musical notation, OPPO designers have innovated an exceptionally thin and stylish new antenna line design. The thick white bands have been replaced with two sets of three ultra-fine lines, each measuring only 0.3 mm. #OPPOF3Plus #SelfieExpert #DualSelfieCamera

We are proud to announce our Pinnacles campaign on Instagram! Over the next few months you will be travelling back in time with us as we witness the birth of photography, and how it has shaped our lives! 
For our premiere post,  we're starting with the very first recorded photograph: 'The View From The Window at Le Gras' by Niépce. Taken in 1836, it shows his estate,  with an incredible long exposure of 8 hours. 
Ou re-creation shot was taken with an R7.

#history #photography #first #blackandwhite #waybackwhen #OPPOxPhoto

2017-11-30.caption:
Mi fans! You have always been our core strength in India and we are grateful for that. Today, we celebrate their contribution in making Xiaomi the No. 1 brand in India by giving back to you!
Xiaomi India has decided to take the biggest step in the history of smartphone industry by giving back ₹500 crores to our community. As a gift to our Mi Fans, Redmi 5A (2GB+16GB) will be priced at ₹4,999 for the first five million units. We are confident that by doing this, we will make innovation possible for everyone. Share this if you're a proud Mi Fan #DeshKaSmartphone

2017-12-01.caption:
Meet the Redmi 5A #DeshKaSmartphone.
First up, we would like to thank each and every Mi fan who believed in Xiaomi and showered us with love and support. Today, Xiaomi is the No.1 smartphone brand in the country and we couldn’t have done this without you. 
Today we strengthen our motto ‘Innovation for Everyone’ by giving you Redmi 5A. After the whopping success of its predecessor, it’s time to welcome the worthy successor. Check out what Redmi 5A has to offer –
● 5 inch HD display
● Qualcomm® Snapdragon™ 425 (Quad-core, max 1.4GHz)
● 3000mAh high-capacity battery, with 8 day standby time ● 13MP rear camera: f/2.2 aperture, 5-element lens and PDAF for fast focusing
● 5MP front camera: f/2.0 aperture, Smart and pro beautify
● Dual SIM + dedicated microSD card slot, expandable upto 128GB (specifically designed for India)
● Super light, only 138 gms 
We are launching two variants of Redmi 5A: ● 2GB RAM + 16GB storage: Priced at INR 4,999 for the first five million units, post which it will be available for INR 5,999 ● 3GB RAM + 32GB storage: Priced at INR 6,999

Mi fans have always been our core strength in India and we are grateful for that. Today, we celebrate their contribution in making Xiaomi the No. 1 brand in India by giving back to our community! 
Xiaomi India has decided to take the biggest step in the history of smartphone industry by giving back INR 500 crores to our community. As a gift to our Mi Fans, Redmi 5A (2GB+16GB) will be priced at INR 4,999 for the first five million units. We are confident that by doing this, we will make innovation possible for everyone.

Redmi 5A will be available from 12 noon, 7 December 2017, across Flipkart, Mi.com, and Mi Home stores, followed by offline retailers, including Mi Preferred Partners in the subsequent weeks.

2017-11-14.caption:
Mi fans! Xiaomi has become the No.1 smartphone brand in India in Q3 2017, as per IDC's latest Quarterly Smartphone Tracker, Q3 2017. Here is a look at some of the feats we achieved this quarter: - Grew our market share to 23.5% in Q3 compared to 17.2% in Q2 2017
- Shipped 9.2 million smartphones
- Became the fastest growing smartphone brand in India with a growth rate of ~300% percent YoY
- 3 out of the top 5 selling smartphones in Q3 2017 were Xiaomi smartphones — Redmi Note 4, Redmi 4 and Redmi 4A
- Redmi Note 4 continued to be the #1 selling smartphone in India with 4Mn units shipped just in Q3

2017-10-11.caption:
Here’s #MiMIX2 for you! - 5.99” full-screen display that blends perfectly with your world
- Under-screen earpiece through the guiding channel, driven by a 50mW high-power receiver to your ears.
- Ultrasonic proximity sensor - a move ahead from traditional infrared proximity sensor
- Round edged screen - to look amazing and reduce bezels
- Below the screen LCD driver IC along with active antenna tuning
- Custom front camera module - Reduces the chin by another 1.5mm
- 18:9 display - 12.5% increase in display area compared to 16:9 display
- Just 7.7mm thin
- Rounded aerospace-grade aluminum alloy frame - Light, firm & corrosion resistant.
- Super black lens coating - Blends the camera into the device
- 18K gold-plated decorative camera rim - Ultra premium looks and feel.
- 4-sided curved ceramic backplate - Each piece takes 7 days to create
- Ceramic offers superior hand feel, scratch resistance & aesthetic. Twice as hard as the typical glass used on the back of smartphones
- Snapdragon 835 processor - 40% more power efficient
- Adreno 540 GPU which improves graphics performance by 25% - 6GB LPDDR4x RAM & 128GB storage
- 12MP Sony IMX386 sensor with large 1.25μm pixels along with 4-axis OIS for picture-perfect shots
- Supports 43 bands across 6 network modes. It works in 226 regions across the globe. Most number of bands in any smartphone ever! - Multi-function NFC
- Dual analog-digital converter function - Professional HD recording.

Priced at ₹35,999, it'll be available on a special preview sale which starts on October 17th for our mi fans at 12 noon exclusively on mi.com and @Flipkart
It will reach mi.com, Flipkart, Mi Preferred Partners & our Mi Homes during the 1st week of November. We’ll be offering #MiMIX2 at 0% EMI, exclusively on mi.com and Flipkart.

2017-09-11.caption:
#MiA1 - 'Created by Xiaomi, Powered by Google'! It's a device that blends the perfect mix of hardware and software. Here's a quick look at the features
- Dual camera with wide angle + Telephoto lens setup giving you perfect portrait shots and 2x optical zoom.
- Android O to be available by end of this year, one of the first to get Android P
- Thin & light profile with 7mm thickness and 168g weight.
- 2.5D curved glass and Corning Gorilla Glass protection
- 4GB RAM + 64GB storage
- Snapdragon 625 Octa-core processor with 14nm FinFET Technology
- Pure Stock Android experience
- Unlimited high-quality photo storage on Google Photos
Priced at ₹14,999, Mi A1 will be available exclusively on Mi.com, Flipkart and Mi Home from September 12, 12 PM! It'll also be available offline across Mi Preferred Partners and Large Format Retailers.

As the winter season sets in, a lot of people struggle to survive the cold.
Giving out a warm cup of good old 'chai' to a person in need can always help bring a little warmth to their lives. #KuchKarteHain

Winters are harsh and cruel. We might not realize it snuggled up in our warm indoors, but for the stray animals around us, every night is a struggle.
Help them out by putting a blanket over them or giving them shelter to spend the night in. Your every little effort can make a difference. #KuchKarteHain

2017-12-22.caption:
Jackets, Sweaters, Gloves, Heaters. Are you ready for this winter? Unfortunately, not everyone is. Every year hundreds of Indians die in the winters. Thousands do not even have a place they can call home.

XOLO, in association with @clothesboxfoundation is taking an initiative to distribute blankets to the people in need. 
SHARE this video (link in bio) with friends and family to help someone survive the winter. Your ONE share is equal to a BLANKET for them. Chalo, #KuchKarteHain
